scripts.build: npm run build:scripts && npm run build:styles && npm run build:markup
scripts.build:scripts: browserify client/app.coffee -d -t coffeeify --extension=.coffee -p [minifyify --compressPath . --map /app.js.map --output public/app.js.map] | hashmark -n public/app.js -s -l 8 -m public/assets.json 'public/{name}-{hash}{ext}'
scripts.build:styles: lessc -x client/app.less | autoprefixer | hashmark -n public/app.css -s -l 8 -m public/assets.json 'public/{name}-{hash}{ext}'
scripts.watch: parallelshell 'npm run watch:markup' 'npm run watch:scripts' 'npm run watch:styles'
